verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, of the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> that were in Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>:

To whom the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amon <S%H526><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, in the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

It came also in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Y'hoyakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, unto the end <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of TZidkiyah-yahu <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, unto the carrying away <S%H1540><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> captive <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Before <S%H2962><s%> I formed <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee in the belly <S%H990><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee; and before thou camest forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of the womb <S%H7358><s%> I sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee, and I ordained <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee a prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I, Ah <S%H162><s%>, YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> ! behold, I cannot <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%>: for I am a child <S%H5288><s%>.

But the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, I am a child <S%H5288><s%>: for thou shalt go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to all that I shall send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, and whatsoever I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of their faces <S%H6440><s%>: for I am with thee to deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Then the YY <S%H3068><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>. And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Behold, I have put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> in thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I have this day <S%H3117><s%> set <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee over the nations <S%H1471><s%> and over the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, to root out <S%H5428><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and to pull down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and to destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and to throw down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, to build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and to plant <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%>, what seest <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thou? And I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a rod <S%H4731><s%> of an almond tree <S%H8247><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> unto me, Thou hast well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8689><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: for I will hasten <S%H8245><s%> <S%H8802><s%> my word <S%H1697><s%> to perform <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me the second time <S%H8145><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What seest <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thou? And I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a seething <S%H5301><s%> <S%H8803><s%> pot <S%H5518><s%>; and the face <S%H6440><s%> thereof is toward <S%H6440><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%>.

Then the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Out of the north <S%H6828><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> shall break forth <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8735><s%> upon all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

For, lo, I will call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8802><s%> all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and they shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and they shall set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> at the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and against all the walls <S%H2346><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>, and against all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.

And I will utter <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> against them touching <S%H5921><s%> all their wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, who have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me, and have burned incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of their own hands <S%H3027><s%>.

Thou therefore gird up <S%H247><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy loins <S%H4975><s%>, and arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto them all that I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee: be not dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8735><s%> at their faces <S%H6440><s%>, lest I confound <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee before <S%H6440><s%> them.

For, behold, I <S%H589><s%> have made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> a defenced <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, and an iron <S%H1270><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%>, and brasen <S%H5178><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> against the whole land <S%H776><s%>, against the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, against the princes <S%H8269><s%> thereof, against the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> thereof, and against the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8738><s%> against thee; but they shall not prevail <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against thee; for I am with thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thee.
